name: Infinity Sword
desc: A sword with an infinite sharpness.

name: Tomahawk
desc: A throwable weapon. It's like a hatchet, but it's not.

name: Chestplate
desc: A standard chestplate to protect...you know, what's in your chest.

name: Helmet
desc: It goes on your head, and protects...well...whatever it is you've got in there.

name: Health Potion
desc: Regenerates health lost from taking on fights.
